oneOf.description:
npm-package-json-lint rule

"off" - turns the rule off
"warning" - turns the rule on as a warning, which doesn't affect the exit code
"error" - turns the rule on as an error, which when triggered generates an exit code of 2

no-absolute-version-dependencies.description: Restrict dependencies from specifying an absolute version.

no-caret-version-dependencies.description: Restrict dependencies from using caret version syntax.

no-restricted-pre-release-dependencies.description: Restrict listed dependencies from using pre-release versions.

no-tilde-version-dependencies.description: Restrict dependencies from using tilde version syntax.

prefer-no-version-zero-dependencies.description: Restrict dependencies from specifying version 0.x.x modules.

prefer-absolute-version-dependencies.description: Require all dependencies to use absolute versions.

prefer-caret-version-dependencies.description: Require all dependencies to use caret version syntax.

prefer-tilde-version-dependencies.description: Require all dependencies to use tilde version syntax.

prefer-alphabetical-dependencies.description: Require dependencies to be listed in alphabetical order.

no-absolute-version-devDependencies.description: Restrict devDependencies from specifying an absolute version.

no-caret-version-devDependencies.description: Restrict devDependencies from using caret version syntax.

no-restricted-pre-release-devDependencie.description: Restrict listed devDependencies from using pre-release versions.

no-tilde-version-devDependencies.description: Restrict devDependencies from using tilde version syntax.

prefer-no-version-zero-devDependencies.description: Restrict devDependencies from specifying version 0.x.x modules.

prefer-absolute-version-devDependencies.description: Require all devDependencies to use absolute versions.

prefer-caret-version-devDependencies.description: Require all devDependencies to use caret version syntax.

prefer-tilde-version-devDependencies.description: Require all devDependencies to use tilde version syntax.

prefer-alphabetical-devDependencies.description: Require devDependencies to be listed in alphabetical order.

prefer-alphabetical-bundledDependencies.description: Require bundledDependencies to be listed in alphabetical order.

prefer-alphabetical-optionalDependencies.description: Require optionalDependencies to be listed in alphabetical order.

prefer-alphabetical-peerDependencies.description: Require peerDependencies to be listed in alphabetical order.

description-format.description: Require description formatting rules, such as: requiring the first letter be capitalized and/or ending with a period.

prefer-property-order.description: Require all package.json properties to be in a specified order.

prefer-no-engineStrict.description: Ensure engineStrict is not present in package.json file.

extends.description: Use the extends property to inherit rules from a shared configuration file/module.

rules.description: npm-package-json-lint rules are configurable. Use the rules object to specify what rules should be used and what severity level they should follow.
